item.title: tmux-tilit - better tiling for tmux ðŸªŸðŸª“
item.description: If you have used tmux then you already know that tmux provides ways to create multiple panes on your terminal among many other things. You might have also felt that the default way of doing these things is kind of clumsy and doesn’t feel natural. Introducing tmux-tilit: What is this tmux-tilit is a tmux plugin that adds tiling window manager like features and keybindings to tmux. Inspiration tmux-tilit was inspired by tmux-tilish.
